name: Single Photo
author: V.J.Catkick

sections.description: A photo image on your sidebar with fancy film like frame. You can bring recent photo from your blogs. The photo source should be WordPress -based blog with default-based theme.
sections.installation:
Place the widget_single_photo folder in your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
and activate through the administration panel, and then go to the widget panel and
drag it to where you would like to have it!
sections.faq:
Can I bring a photo from my own other blog?

Yes, you can specify any URL you want, but this program designed for ‘photo blog’ so in some case, the photo will overflow its frame.

I’m good at CSS. What is the content id name?

The photo and its frame belongs >div id=”widget_single_photo”< so you can modify your site’s CSS file to decorate it.

short_description: Display one single photo from your WordPress blog or another WordPress-based blog on your sidebar with fancy "film like" frame.
description: A photo image on your sidebar with fancy film like frame. You can bring recent photo from your blogs. The photo source should be WordPress -based blog with default-based theme.
